extensionDescription.message: Add-on for Mozilla Firefox that lets you filter people and topics from webpages

menuItemAddToFilterList.description: Adds the selected term to the filter list, so the extension can filter it when loading a webpage.

menuItemMatch.description: If enabled only whole word matches will get filtered

menuItemShowFilterList.description: Outputs all items in the filter list to the browser console

menuItemClearFilterList.description: Removes all items from the filter list.
